channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Caffeine may be just the exercise booster you need—as long as you don’t over do it, say experts
item.description: “It’s a great performance enhancer,” one expert says. Here’s why it’s important to use the stimulant responsibly.

item.title: A Year After Feinstein’s Death, Her Life’s Belongings Are for Sale
item.description: Senator Dianne Feinstein collected fine jewelry, paintings and a trove of political mementos. Because of her trust, many of those items are available ...

item.title: Ship in Need of Repairs Has Explosive Cargo, but No Dock
item.description: The MV Ruby has meandered around Europe’s northwestern coastline under a cloud of suspicion over its thousands of tons of Russian fertilizer.

item.title: Elon Musk says he is ‘Dark MAGA’ at Trump campaign rally
item.description: Billionaire tech executive Elon Musk cast the upcoming presidential election in dire terms during an appearance with Donald Trump.

item.title: At a Tennessee Plastics Plant, Sorrow and Uncertainty in Helene’s Wake
item.description: More than a week after workers fled flooding outside their factory, much remains unclear, including how many died.

item.title: Pope Names 21 New Cardinals, Reaching Far Beyond Europe
item.description: The appointments cement Francis’ imprint on the group that will choose his successor, and reflect his vision of a more truly global Roman Catholic Chu...

item.title: Elon Musk Leaps to Trump’s Side in Rally Appearance
item.description: Mr. Musk, the world’s richest man and the leader of Tesla and X, delivered a dark warning during an animated appearance at former President Donald J. ...

item.title: Fear Overshadows Oct. 7 Memorial Preparations in Israel
item.description: Amid the chaos and the war that followed the Hamas-led assault, Israel has not yet held a national day of mourning for the 1,200 people who were kille...

item.title: Affordable housing units across the U.S. are about to hit their expiration date
item.description: The buildings typically only need to be kept affordable for a minimum of 30 years.

item.title: Live Updates: Israel Signals an Escalation of Military Activity in Gaza
item.description: Israel has also broadened its attacks in Lebanon in recent days, expanding its campaign against Hezbollah, an Iranian-backed ally of Hamas.

item.title: U.K. Prime Minister’s Chief of Staff, Sue Gray, Resigns
item.description: Ms. Gray said intense media scrutiny of her role meant she “risked becoming a distraction” to the new Labour government.

item.title: How to watch Week Five of the 2024-2025 NFL season live online for free—and without cable
‘Joker’ Sequel Falls Far Short of Original at the Box Office
item.description: The bleak musical drama is on track to open to around $45 million, less than half of what the 2019 version made on its first weekend.

item.title: If you’re under 50 today, could you really live to 150? Geneticists and aging researchers weigh in
item.description: In the craze to live longer and healthier, how long can we expect to live?

item.title: U.K. Prime Minister’s Chief of Staff, Sue Gray, Resigns
item.description: Ms. Gray said intense media scrutiny of her role meant she “risked becoming a distraction” to the new Labour government.
